actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Postal Reorganization Act of 1970, title 39, United States Code, to provide for uniformity in labor relations.

summary.text: Repeals the postal law provision assuring each employee of the Postal Service the right to join or form a labor organization, or to refrain from such activity. (Repeals 39 U.S.C. 1209(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Postal Reorganization Act of 1970, title 39, United States Code, to provide for uniformity in labor relations.
